column2: Role Description This is a full-time role for a Piano Teacher at BodhiTree School of Music located in Pune. The Piano Teacher will be responsible for providing instruction in piano playing, piano education, music theory, and music education.

Position Summary:    Teach music to tribal children in a school abutting Bandipur forest        Position Summary:    Music Teacher for a residential school for indigenous tribal students in Hosahalli, in H D Kote taluk of Mysuru District.      The teacher is expected to teach music to the students in friendly way to reach students and engage them according to the lesson plans. Should be motivating and mentoring students.      Type: Full Time        Key Responsibilities:          Teaching music to the tribal students      Giving exposure to the students in different styles of music      Encouraging and involving with them to learn their traditional music      Keeping the learning joyful, contextually relevant and culturally appropriate      Encouraging students to participate in musical competitions and events        Skills        Well versed in music (Carnatic, classical and western etc)      Experience in teaching, preferably young children      Effective oral and written communication skills in Kannada and English          Certification in Carnatic Music, Graduate / Post graduate in related discipline      0 to 2 years of experience        Why work with us:        An opportunity to be part of a nationally acclaimed, credible non-profit organization      Cordial working environment with strong values and service mindset      Experienced candidates will be eligible for increments as per organisation s salary scale      SVYM was recognized by Great Place to Work in the year 2020-21

Relevant Experience:    Min 2-3 years experience and proficiency in teaching Indian/ Western dance.        Relevant Experience:    Min 2-3 years experience as a music teacher in a reputed school.      Story Telling Teachers        Qualification:    Graduate in any discipline. Any training in theatre or storytelling is must.        Relevant Experience:    Min 2-3 years experience as a story teller.        Required Skills:    Excellent communication skills, young and energetic, passion for reading and love for kids and books.      Story teller s job is to tell stories at school and inspire children to pick up reading as a habit. The job requires transforming classrooms and libraries into light spaces full of laughter and inspiration.        Relevant Experience:    Min 2-3 years experience as a dramatics teacher.        Required Skills:    Effective communication skills, organised, energetic and self-directed.        Relevant Experience:    Min 2-3 years experience as a sports teacher in schools.        Required Skills:    Fit and energetic, good English communication skills, love for sports and children.

column2: August Music Productions is looking for Administrative to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey        Office Management:          Greet visitors and answer incoming calls, directing them to the appropriate staff members or departments.      Maintain a clean and organized office environment, including conference rooms, common areas, and supply rooms.      Manage office supplies inventory, order replacements as needed, and ensure cost-effective purchasing practices.              Administrative Support:          Assist with scheduling appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements for staff members.      Prepare and distribute internal communications, memos, and reports as requested.      Handle incoming and outgoing mail, including sorting, distributing, and processing deliveries.              Data Entry and Record-Keeping:          Enter data accurately into databases, spreadsheets, and other software systems.      Maintain electronic and paper records, ensuring confidentiality and compliance with data protection regulations.      Organize and archive documents, files, and records for easy retrieval and reference.              Customer Service:          Respond to inquiries from clients, vendors, and other external parties in a professional and timely manner.      Assist with resolving customer complaints or concerns, escalating issues to appropriate personnel as needed.      Provide support to sales and marketing teams by preparing promotional materials, coordinating events, and managing customer databases.              Special Projects and Initiatives:          Assist with special projects, events, or initiatives as assigned by management.      Conduct research, gather data, and prepare presentations or reports to support decision-making processes.      Collaborate with team members to streamline processes and improve overall efficiency within the organization.
